alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coffee County through 430 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Enterprise, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Richburg, Lucile, Turner Crossroads, Central City, Cool Springs, Clintonville, Battens Crossroads, Shell Army Field, Goodman, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Keyton, Coppinville, Enterprise Municipal A/P and Marvin Chapel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
